LanguageData.MSRimCodamol.label: RimCodamol
LanguageData.MSRimCodamol.description: A mild opiate pain medication that lasts about a day. Can be potentially addictive (mostly if taken too much in a short space of time).
LanguageData.MSMorphine.label: Morphine
LanguageData.MSMorphine.description: A potent opiate pain medication that lasts about a half a day. Can be addictive.
LanguageData.MSOpiumPipe.label: Opium pipe
LanguageData.MSOpiumPipe.description: An early and crude, if still potent opiate pain medication that lasts about a half a day. Can be quite addictive.
